CLUE: Arab or Muslim at time of the Crusades
FOUND IN: Saracen (historical term for Arabs used by Europeans during the Crusades)
Hybrid (a mix of two or more things)
Nirvana (spiritual liberation and release from attachments)
Blue (slang for feeling down or depressed)
Gold - Although not pure gold, the color associated with it is often described as 'golden,' which is a rich yellow hue.
